description: Agglomerative Clustering. Recursively merges the pair of clusters that minimally increases a given linkage distance.

param.name: n_clusters
param.description: The number of clusters to find. It will be set to ignored if set_distance_threshold is True

param.name: affinity
param.description: Metric used to compute the linkage. Can be “euclidean”, “l1”, “l2”, “manhattan”, “cosine”, or “precomputed”. If linkage is “ward”, only “euclidean” is accepted. If “precomputed”, a distance matrix (instead of a similarity matrix) is needed as input for the fit method.

param.name: linkage
param.description: Which linkage criterion to use. The linkage criterion determines which distance to use between sets of observation. The algorithm will merge the pairs of cluster that minimize this criterion.

param.name: distance_threshold
param.description: The linkage distance threshold above which, clusters will not be merged. Ignored when set_distance_threshold is false.
